channel.title: [474] How do I change the currency in a shop?
channel.description:
Title says it all.
This is how my shop file is: ShopID---ShopName---------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount

item.description:

This tutorial should give you the base of it. All you’ll really need to do is rename/convert a few methods in your current source because I believe this tut is for PI.

item.title: [474] How do I change the currency in a shop?
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Look for the java file where it handles the shops then it look and see if it contains the currency of cash “995” in it and if it does, change it to your wanting and see if it changes.
